Plot3D.Write¶

plot3d.write.write_plot3D(filename: str, blocks: List[plot3d.block.Block], binary: bool = True)[source]¶

Writes blocks to a Plot3D file

Parameters

  • filename (str) – name of the file to create

  • blocks (List[Block]) – List containing all the blocks to write

  • binary (bool, optional) – Format required. Defaults to True.
